By definition, we have ğ”¼â€‹ğk=ğ”¼â€‹ğk,1+â‹¯+ğ”¼â€‹ğk,Ï„âˆ’1ğ”¼subscriptğğ‘˜ğ”¼subscriptğğ‘˜1â‹¯ğ”¼subscriptğğ‘˜ğœ1\mathbb{E}{\mathbf{e}}_{k}=\mathbb{E}{\mathbf{e}}_{k,1}+\cdots+\mathbb{E}{\mathbf{e}}_{k,\tau-1} and hence âˆ¥ğ”¼â€‹ğkâˆ¥2â‰¤(Ï„âˆ’1)â€‹âˆ¥ğ”¼â€‹ğk,1âˆ¥2+â‹¯+(Ï„âˆ’1)â€‹âˆ¥ğ”¼â€‹ğk,Ï„âˆ’1âˆ¥2superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ”¼subscriptğğ‘˜2ğœ1superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ”¼subscriptğğ‘˜12â‹¯ğœ1superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ”¼subscriptğğ‘˜ğœ12\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbb{E}{\mathbf{e}}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2}\leq(\tau-1)\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbb{E}{\mathbf{e}}_{k,1}\right\rVert}^{2}+\cdots+(\tau-1)\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbb{E}{\mathbf{e}}_{k,\tau-1}\right\rVert}^{2}. The first term âˆ¥ğ”¼â€‹ğk,1âˆ¥2superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ”¼subscriptğğ‘˜12\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbb{E}{\mathbf{e}}_{k,1}\right\rVert}^{2} can be bounded using Assumptions 2 and 3 as follows:

âˆ¥ğ”¼â€‹ğk,1âˆ¥2superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ”¼subscriptğğ‘˜12\displaystyle\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbb{E}{\mathbf{e}}_{k,1}\right\rVert}^{2} =âˆ¥1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,1(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,1)âˆ¥2absentsuperscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜1âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜12\displaystyle=\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,1}\right)-\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,1}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (72)
=âˆ¥1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,1(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,1)âˆ¥2absentsuperscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜1âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜12\displaystyle=\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\nabla f\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,1}\right)-\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,1}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (73)
â‰¤1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,1(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,1)âˆ¥2absent1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜1âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜12\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,1}\right)-\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,1}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (74)
â‰¤1nâ€‹L2â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±k,1(i)âˆ’Î²k,1âˆ¥2absent1ğ‘›superscriptğ¿2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜1subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜12\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{n}L^{2}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,1}-\beta_{k,1}\right\rVert}^{2} (75)
=1nâ€‹L2â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥(ğ±k,0(i)âˆ’Î·kâ€‹âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,0(i)))âˆ’(Î²k,0âˆ’Î·kâ€‹âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,0))âˆ¥2absent1ğ‘›superscriptğ¿2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜0subscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜0subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜0subscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜02\displaystyle=\frac{1}{n}L^{2}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,0}-\eta_{k}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,0}\right)\right)-\left(\beta_{k,0}-\eta_{k}\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,0}\right)\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (76)
=1nâ€‹L2â€‹Î·k2â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k)âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k)âˆ¥2absent1ğ‘›superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptğ±ğ‘˜âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘˜2\displaystyle=\frac{1}{n}L^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(\mathbf{x}_{k}\right)-\nabla f\left(\mathbf{x}_{k}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (77)
â‰¤L2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Î·k2.absentsuperscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2\displaystyle\leq L^{2}\sigma^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}. (78)

In general, for each t=1â€‹â‹¯,Ï„âˆ’1ğ‘¡1â‹¯ğœ1t=1\cdots,\tau-1 we can write

âˆ¥ğ”¼â€‹ğk,tâˆ¥2superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ”¼subscriptğğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbb{E}{\mathbf{e}}_{k,t}\right\rVert}^{2} =âˆ¥1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,t)âˆ¥2absentsuperscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle=\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)-\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,t}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (79)
=âˆ¥1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,t)âˆ¥2absentsuperscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle=\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\nabla f\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)-\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,t}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (80)
â‰¤1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,t)âˆ¥2absent1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)-\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,t}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (81)
â‰¤1nâ€‹L2â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±k,t(i)âˆ’Î²k,tâˆ¥2.absent1ğ‘›superscriptğ¿2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{n}L^{2}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,t}-\beta_{k,t}\right\rVert}^{2}. (82)

Let us denote ak,tâ‰”1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±k,t(i)âˆ’Î²k,tâˆ¥2â‰”subscriptğ‘ğ‘˜ğ‘¡1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2a_{k,t}\coloneqq\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,t}-\beta_{k,t}\right\rVert}^{2}. In the following, we will derive a recursive bound on atsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡a_{t}. That is,

ak,tsubscriptğ‘ğ‘˜ğ‘¡\displaystyle a_{k,t} =1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±k,t(i)âˆ’Î²k,tâˆ¥2absent1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle=\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,t}-\beta_{k,t}\right\rVert}^{2} (83)
=1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼âˆ¥(ğ±k,0(i)âˆ’Î·kâ€‹âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,0(i))âˆ’â‹¯âˆ’Î·kâ€‹âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,tâˆ’1(i)))absentconditional1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜0subscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜0â‹¯subscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡1\displaystyle=\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\Bigg{\|}\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,0}-\eta_{k}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,0}\right)-\cdots-\eta_{k}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,t-1}\right)\right) (84)
âˆ’(Î²k,0âˆ’Î·kâˆ‡f(Î²k,0)âˆ’â‹¯âˆ’Î·kâˆ‡f(Î²k,tâˆ’1))âˆ¥2\displaystyle\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad-\left(\beta_{k,0}-\eta_{k}\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,0}\right)-\cdots-\eta_{k}\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,t-1}\right)\right)\Bigg{\|}^{2} (85)
=1nâ€‹Î·k2â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,0(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,0)+â‹¯+âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,tâˆ’1(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,tâˆ’1)â€–2absent1ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptnorm~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜0âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜0â‹¯~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡1âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜ğ‘¡12\displaystyle=\frac{1}{n}\eta_{k}^{2}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\Bigg{\|}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,0}\right)-\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,0}\right)+\cdots+\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,t-1}\right)-\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,t-1}\right)\Bigg{\|}^{2} (86)
â‰¤Î·k2â€‹Ïƒ2+1nâ€‹Î·k2â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,1(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,1)+â‹¯+âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,tâˆ’1(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,tâˆ’1)â€–2absentsuperscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2superscriptğœ21ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptnorm~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜1âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜1â‹¯~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡1âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜ğ‘¡12\displaystyle\leq\eta_{k}^{2}\sigma^{2}+\frac{1}{n}\eta_{k}^{2}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\Bigg{\|}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,1}\right)-\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,1}\right)+\cdots+\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,t-1}\right)-\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,t-1}\right)\Bigg{\|}^{2} (87)
â‰¤Î·k2â€‹Ïƒ2+1nâ€‹Î·k2â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼âˆ¥âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,1(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,1(i))+âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,1(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,1)absentsuperscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2superscriptğœ2conditional1ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜1âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜1âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜1âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜1\displaystyle\leq\eta_{k}^{2}\sigma^{2}+\frac{1}{n}\eta_{k}^{2}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\Bigg{\|}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,1}\right)-\nabla f\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,1}\right)+\nabla f\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,1}\right)-\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,1}\right) (88)
+â‹¯+âˆ‡~fi(ğ±k,tâˆ’1(i))âˆ’âˆ‡f(ğ±k,tâˆ’1(i))+âˆ‡f(ğ±k,tâˆ’1(i))âˆ’âˆ‡f(Î²k,tâˆ’1)âˆ¥2\displaystyle\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad+\cdots+\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,t-1}\right)-\nabla f\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,t-1}\right)+\nabla f\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,t-1}\right)-\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,t-1}\right)\Bigg{\|}^{2} (89)
â‰¤tâ€‹Î·k2â€‹Ïƒ2+1nâ€‹Î·k2â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,1(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,1)+â‹¯â€‹âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,tâˆ’1(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,tâˆ’1)â€–2absentğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2superscriptğœ21ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜1âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜1â‹¯âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡1âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜ğ‘¡12\displaystyle\leq t\eta_{k}^{2}\sigma^{2}+\frac{1}{n}\eta_{k}^{2}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\Bigg{\|}\nabla f\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,1}\right)-\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,1}\right)+\cdots\nabla f\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,t-1}\right)-\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,t-1}\right)\Bigg{\|}^{2} (90)
â‰¤tâ€‹Î·k2â€‹Ïƒ2+(tâˆ’1)â€‹L2â€‹Î·k2â€‹1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ±k,1(i)âˆ’Î²k,1â€–2+â‹¯â€‹(tâˆ’1)â€‹L2â€‹Î·k2â€‹1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹â€–ğ±k,tâˆ’1(i)âˆ’Î²k,tâˆ’1â€–2absentğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2superscriptğœ2ğ‘¡1superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜21ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptnormsubscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜1subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜12â‹¯ğ‘¡1superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜21ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptnormsubscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡1subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜ğ‘¡12\displaystyle\leq t\eta_{k}^{2}\sigma^{2}+(t-1)L^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\Bigg{\|}\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,1}-\beta_{k,1}\Bigg{\|}^{2}+\cdots(t-1)L^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\Bigg{\|}\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,t-1}-\beta_{k,t-1}\Bigg{\|}^{2} (91)
=tâ€‹Î·k2â€‹Ïƒ2+(tâˆ’1)â€‹L2â€‹Î·k2â€‹(ak,1+â‹¯+ak,tâˆ’1)absentğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2superscriptğœ2ğ‘¡1superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2subscriptğ‘ğ‘˜1â‹¯subscriptğ‘ğ‘˜ğ‘¡1\displaystyle=t\eta_{k}^{2}\sigma^{2}+(t-1)L^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}\left(a_{k,1}+\cdots+a_{k,t-1}\right) (92)
â‰¤Ï„â€‹Î·k2â€‹Ïƒ2+Ï„â€‹L2â€‹Î·k2â€‹(ak,1+â‹¯+ak,tâˆ’1).absentğœsuperscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2superscriptğœ2ğœsuperscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2subscriptğ‘ğ‘˜1â‹¯subscriptğ‘ğ‘˜ğ‘¡1\displaystyle\leq\tau\eta_{k}^{2}\sigma^{2}+\tau L^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}\left(a_{k,1}+\cdots+a_{k,t-1}\right). (93)

Therefore, for the sequence {ak,1,â‹¯,ak,Ï„âˆ’1}subscriptğ‘ğ‘˜1â‹¯subscriptğ‘ğ‘˜ğœ1\{a_{k,1},\cdots,a_{k,\tau-1}\} we have shown that

ak,tsubscriptğ‘ğ‘˜ğ‘¡\displaystyle a_{k,t} â‰¤Ï„â€‹Î·k2â€‹Ïƒ2+Ï„â€‹L2â€‹Î·k2â€‹(ak,1+â‹¯+ak,tâˆ’1),absentğœsuperscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2superscriptğœ2ğœsuperscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2subscriptğ‘ğ‘˜1â‹¯subscriptğ‘ğ‘˜ğ‘¡1\displaystyle\leq\tau\eta_{k}^{2}\sigma^{2}+\tau L^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}\left(a_{k,1}+\cdots+a_{k,t-1}\right), (94)

where ak,1â‰¤Ïƒ2â€‹Î·k2subscriptğ‘ğ‘˜1superscriptğœ2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2a_{k,1}\leq\sigma^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}. We can show by induction, that such sequence satisfies the following inequality:

ak,tsubscriptğ‘ğ‘˜ğ‘¡\displaystyle a_{k,t} â‰¤Ï„â€‹Î·k2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹(1+Ï„â€‹L2â€‹Î·k2)tâˆ’1.absentğœsuperscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2superscriptğœ2superscript1ğœsuperscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2ğ‘¡1\displaystyle\leq\tau\eta_{k}^{2}\sigma^{2}\left(1+\tau L^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}\right)^{t-1}. (95)

See Section 7.5 for the detailed proof. Therefore, we have

âˆ¥ğ”¼â€‹ğkâˆ¥2superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ”¼subscriptğğ‘˜2\displaystyle\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbb{E}{\mathbf{e}}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2} â‰¤(Ï„âˆ’1)â€‹âˆ¥ğ”¼â€‹ğk,1âˆ¥2+â‹¯+(Ï„âˆ’1)â€‹âˆ¥ğ”¼â€‹ğk,Ï„âˆ’1âˆ¥2absentğœ1superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ”¼subscriptğğ‘˜12â‹¯ğœ1superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ”¼subscriptğğ‘˜ğœ12\displaystyle\leq(\tau-1)\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbb{E}{\mathbf{e}}_{k,1}\right\rVert}^{2}+\cdots+(\tau-1)\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbb{E}{\mathbf{e}}_{k,\tau-1}\right\rVert}^{2} (96)
â‰¤(Ï„âˆ’1)â€‹L2â€‹(a1+â‹¯+aÏ„âˆ’1)absentğœ1superscriptğ¿2subscriptğ‘1â‹¯subscriptğ‘ğœ1\displaystyle\leq(\tau-1)L^{2}\left(a_{1}+\cdots+a_{\tau-1}\right) (97)
â‰¤Ï„â€‹(Ï„âˆ’1)2â€‹L2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Î·k2â€‹(1+Ï„â€‹L2â€‹Î·k2)Ï„.absentğœsuperscriptğœ12superscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2superscript1ğœsuperscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2ğœ\displaystyle\leq\tau(\tau-1)^{2}L^{2}\sigma^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}\left(1+\tau L^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}\right)^{\tau}. (98)

Now, we use the inequality 1+xâ‰¤ex1ğ‘¥superscriptğ‘’ğ‘¥1+x\leq e^{x} and conclude that

âˆ¥ğ”¼â€‹ğkâˆ¥2â‰¤Ï„â€‹(Ï„âˆ’1)2â€‹L2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Î·k2â€‹eÏ„2â€‹L2â€‹Î·k2.superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ”¼subscriptğğ‘˜2ğœsuperscriptğœ12superscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2superscriptğ‘’superscriptğœ2superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2\displaystyle\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbb{E}{\mathbf{e}}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2}\leq\tau(\tau-1)^{2}L^{2}\sigma^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}e^{\tau^{2}L^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}}. (99)

Therefore, if Ï„2â€‹L2â€‹Î·k2â‰¤1superscriptğœ2superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜21\tau^{2}L^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}\leq 1, we have

âˆ¥ğ”¼â€‹ğkâˆ¥2superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ”¼subscriptğğ‘˜2\displaystyle\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbb{E}{\mathbf{e}}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2} â‰¤Ï„â€‹(Ï„âˆ’1)2â€‹L2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹eâ€‹Î·k2.absentğœsuperscriptğœ12superscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ2ğ‘’superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2\displaystyle\leq\tau(\tau-1)^{2}L^{2}\sigma^{2}e\eta_{k}^{2}. (100)

Finally, we bound the third term in (64), that is ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğkâˆ¥2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğğ‘˜2\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{e}}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2}. Using the definition, we know that ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğkâˆ¥2â‰¤Ï„â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğk,0âˆ¥2+â‹¯+Ï„â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğk,Ï„âˆ’1âˆ¥2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğğ‘˜2ğœğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğğ‘˜02â‹¯ğœğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğğ‘˜ğœ12\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{e}}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2}\leq\tau\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{e}}_{k,0}\right\rVert}^{2}+\cdots+\tau\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{e}}_{k,\tau-1}\right\rVert}^{2}. Firstly, note that

ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğk,0âˆ¥2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğğ‘˜02\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{e}}_{k,0}\right\rVert}^{2} =ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,0(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,0)âˆ¥2absentğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜0âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜02\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,0}\right)-\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,0}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (101)
=ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k)âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k)âˆ¥2absentğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptğ±ğ‘˜âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘˜2\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(\mathbf{x}_{k}\right)-\nabla f\left(\mathbf{x}_{k}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (102)
â‰¤Ïƒ2n.absentsuperscriptğœ2ğ‘›\displaystyle\leq\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}. (103)

For each t=1,â‹¯,Ï„âˆ’1ğ‘¡1â‹¯ğœ1t=1,\cdots,\tau-1 we have

ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğk,tâˆ¥2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{e}}_{k,t}\right\rVert}^{2} =ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,t)âˆ¥2absentğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)-\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,t}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (104)
=ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))+1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,t)âˆ¥2absentğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)-\nabla f\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)+\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\nabla f\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)-\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,t}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (105)
â‰¤Ïƒ2n+L2â€‹1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±k,t(i)âˆ’Î²k,tâˆ¥2absentsuperscriptğœ2ğ‘›superscriptğ¿21ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\leq\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}+L^{2}\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,t}-\beta_{k,t}\right\rVert}^{2} (106)
=Ïƒ2n+L2â€‹ak,t.absentsuperscriptğœ2ğ‘›superscriptğ¿2subscriptğ‘ğ‘˜ğ‘¡\displaystyle=\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}+L^{2}a_{k,t}. (107)

Summing over t=0,1,â‹¯,Ï„âˆ’1ğ‘¡01â‹¯ğœ1t=0,1,\cdots,\tau-1 results in the following

ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğkâˆ¥2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğğ‘˜2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{e}}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2} â‰¤Ï„â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğk,0âˆ¥2+â‹¯+Ï„â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğk,Ï„âˆ’1âˆ¥2absentğœğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğğ‘˜02â‹¯ğœğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğğ‘˜ğœ12\displaystyle\leq\tau\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{e}}_{k,0}\right\rVert}^{2}+\cdots+\tau\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{e}}_{k,\tau-1}\right\rVert}^{2} (108)
â‰¤Ï„2â€‹Ïƒ2n+Ï„â€‹L2â€‹(a1+â‹¯+aÏ„âˆ’1)absentsuperscriptğœ2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›ğœsuperscriptğ¿2subscriptğ‘1â‹¯subscriptğ‘ğœ1\displaystyle\leq\tau^{2}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}+\tau L^{2}\left(a_{1}+\cdots+a_{\tau-1}\right) (109)
â‰¤Ï„2â€‹Ïƒ2n+Ï„2â€‹(Ï„âˆ’1)â€‹L2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Î·k2â€‹(1+Ï„â€‹L2â€‹Î·k2)Ï„absentsuperscriptğœ2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›superscriptğœ2ğœ1superscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2superscript1ğœsuperscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2ğœ\displaystyle\leq\tau^{2}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}+\tau^{2}(\tau-1)L^{2}\sigma^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}\left(1+\tau L^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}\right)^{\tau} (110)
â‰¤Ï„2â€‹Ïƒ2n+Ï„2â€‹(Ï„âˆ’1)â€‹L2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹eâ€‹Î·k2.absentsuperscriptğœ2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›superscriptğœ2ğœ1superscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ2ğ‘’superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2\displaystyle\leq\tau^{2}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}+\tau^{2}(\tau-1)L^{2}\sigma^{2}e\eta_{k}^{2}. (111)

Now, we can put everything together and conclude Lemma 2, as follows

ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±Â¯k,Ï„âˆ’ğ±âˆ—âˆ¥2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğœsuperscriptğ±2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,\tau}-\mathbf{x}^{*}\right\rVert}^{2} =(1+nâ€‹Î·k2)â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±kâˆ’Î·kâ€‹ğ kâˆ’ğ±âˆ—âˆ¥2+1mâ€‹âˆ¥ğ”¼â€‹ğkâˆ¥2+Î·k2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğkâˆ¥2absent1ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ±ğ‘˜subscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜subscriptğ ğ‘˜superscriptğ±21ğ‘šsuperscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ”¼subscriptğğ‘˜2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğğ‘˜2\displaystyle=\left(1+n\eta_{k}^{2}\right)\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}_{k}-\eta_{k}{\mathbf{g}}_{k}-\mathbf{x}^{*}\right\rVert}^{2}+\frac{1}{m}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbb{E}{\mathbf{e}}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2}+\eta_{k}^{2}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{e}}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2} (112)
â‰¤(1+nâ€‹Î·k2)â€‹(1âˆ’Î¼â€‹Î·k)Ï„â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±kâˆ’ğ±âˆ—âˆ¥2absent1ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2superscript1ğœ‡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜ğœğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ±ğ‘˜superscriptğ±2\displaystyle\leq\left(1+n\eta_{k}^{2}\right)\left(1-\mu\eta_{k}\right)^{\tau}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}_{k}-\mathbf{x}^{*}\right\rVert}^{2} (113)
+Ï„â€‹(Ï„âˆ’1)2â€‹L2â€‹Ïƒ2nâ€‹eâ€‹Î·k2+Ï„2â€‹Ïƒ2nâ€‹Î·k2ğœsuperscriptğœ12superscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›ğ‘’superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2superscriptğœ2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2\displaystyle\quad+\tau(\tau-1)^{2}L^{2}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}e\eta_{k}^{2}+\tau^{2}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}\eta_{k}^{2} (114)
+Ï„2â€‹(Ï„âˆ’1)â€‹L2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹eâ€‹Î·k4.superscriptğœ2ğœ1superscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ2ğ‘’superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜4\displaystyle\quad+\tau^{2}(\tau-1)L^{2}\sigma^{2}e\eta_{k}^{4}. (115)

7.3 Proof of Lemma 3

According to the notations defined on (24), we can write

ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±^k+1âˆ’ğ±Â¯k,Ï„âˆ¥2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğœ2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1}-\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,\tau}\right\rVert}^{2} =ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±k+1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]Qâ€‹(ğ±k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ±k)âˆ’1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ±k,Ï„(i)âˆ¥2absentğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ±ğ‘˜1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ‘„subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptğ±ğ‘˜1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœ2\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}_{k}+\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}Q\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\mathbf{x}_{k}\right)-\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}\right\rVert}^{2} (116)
=ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]Qâ€‹(ğ±k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ±k)âˆ’(ğ±k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ±k)âˆ¥2absentğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ‘„subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptğ±ğ‘˜subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptğ±ğ‘˜2\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}Q\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\mathbf{x}_{k}\right)-\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\mathbf{x}_{k}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (117)
=1n2â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥Qâ€‹(ğ±k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ±k)âˆ’(ğ±k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ±k)âˆ¥2absent1superscriptğ‘›2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘„subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptğ±ğ‘˜subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptğ±ğ‘˜2\displaystyle=\frac{1}{n^{2}}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert Q\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\mathbf{x}_{k}\right)-\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\mathbf{x}_{k}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (118)
â‰¤qâ€‹1n2â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ±kâˆ¥2,absentğ‘1superscriptğ‘›2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptğ±ğ‘˜2\displaystyle\leq q\frac{1}{n^{2}}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\mathbf{x}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2}, (119)

where, we used Assumption 1. In particular, the last equality above follows from the fact that the random quatizer is unbiased and the quantizations are carried out independently in each iteration and each worker. Moreover, the last inequality in (119) simply relates the variance of the quantization to its argument. Next, we bound ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ±kâˆ¥2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptğ±ğ‘˜2\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\mathbf{x}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2} for each worker iâˆˆ[n]ğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›i\in[n]. From the update rule in Algorithm 1 we have

ğ±k,Ï„(i)subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœ\displaystyle\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,\tau} =ğ±kâˆ’Î·kâ€‹(âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,0(i))+â‹¯+âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,Ï„âˆ’1(i)))absentsubscriptğ±ğ‘˜subscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜0â‹¯~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœ1\displaystyle=\mathbf{x}_{k}-\eta_{k}\left(\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,0}\right)+\cdots+\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,\tau-1}\right)\right) (120)
=ğ±kâˆ’Î·kâ€‹(ğ k+ğk(i)),absentsubscriptğ±ğ‘˜subscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜subscriptğ ğ‘˜subscriptsuperscriptğğ‘–ğ‘˜\displaystyle=\mathbf{x}_{k}-\eta_{k}\left({\mathbf{g}}_{k}+{\mathbf{e}}^{(i)}_{k}\right), (121)

where we denote

ğk(i)â‰”âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,0(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,0)+â‹¯+âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,Ï„âˆ’1(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,Ï„âˆ’1),â‰”subscriptsuperscriptğğ‘–ğ‘˜~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜0âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜0â‹¯~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœ1âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜ğœ1\displaystyle{\mathbf{e}}^{(i)}_{k}\coloneqq\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,0}\right)-\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,0}\right)+\cdots+\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,\tau-1}\right)-\nabla f\left(\beta_{k,\tau-1}\right), (122)

and ğ k=âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,0)+â‹¯+âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,Ï„âˆ’1)subscriptğ ğ‘˜âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜0â‹¯âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜ğœ1{\mathbf{g}}_{k}=\nabla f(\beta_{k,0})+\cdots+\nabla f(\beta_{k,\tau-1}) as defined before. Using these notations we have

ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ±kâˆ¥2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptğ±ğ‘˜2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\mathbf{x}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2} =Î·k2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ k+ğk(i)âˆ¥2absentsuperscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ ğ‘˜subscriptsuperscriptğğ‘–ğ‘˜2\displaystyle=\eta_{k}^{2}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{g}}_{k}+{\mathbf{e}}^{(i)}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2} (123)
â‰¤2â€‹Î·k2â€‹âˆ¥ğ kâˆ¥2+2â€‹Î·k2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğk(i)âˆ¥2.absent2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ ğ‘˜22superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğğ‘–ğ‘˜2\displaystyle\leq 2\eta_{k}^{2}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{g}}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2}+2\eta_{k}^{2}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{e}}^{(i)}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2}. (124)

Let us first bound the first term in (124), i.e. âˆ¥ğ kâˆ¥2superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ ğ‘˜2\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{g}}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2}. That is,

âˆ¥ğ kâˆ¥2superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ ğ‘˜2\displaystyle\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{g}}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2} â‰¤Ï„â€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,0)âˆ¥2+â‹¯+Ï„â€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î²k,Ï„âˆ’1)âˆ¥2absentğœsuperscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜02â‹¯ğœsuperscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ›½ğ‘˜ğœ12\displaystyle\leq\tau\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f(\beta_{k,0})\right\rVert}^{2}+\cdots+\tau\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f(\beta_{k,\tau-1})\right\rVert}^{2} (125)
â‰¤(a)â€‹Ï„â€‹L2â€‹(âˆ¥ğ±kâˆ’ğ±âˆ—âˆ¥2+â‹¯+(1âˆ’Î¼â€‹Î·k)Ï„âˆ’1â€‹âˆ¥ğ±kâˆ’ğ±âˆ—âˆ¥2)ğ‘ğœsuperscriptğ¿2superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ±ğ‘˜superscriptğ±2â‹¯superscript1ğœ‡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜ğœ1superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ±ğ‘˜superscriptğ±2\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{\leq}\tau L^{2}\left(\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}_{k}-\mathbf{x}^{*}\right\rVert}^{2}+\cdots+\left(1-\mu\eta_{k}\right)^{\tau-1}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}_{k}-\mathbf{x}^{*}\right\rVert}^{2}\right) (126)
â‰¤Ï„2â€‹L2â€‹âˆ¥ğ±kâˆ’ğ±âˆ—âˆ¥2,absentsuperscriptğœ2superscriptğ¿2superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ±ğ‘˜superscriptğ±2\displaystyle\leq\tau^{2}L^{2}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}_{k}-\mathbf{x}^{*}\right\rVert}^{2}, (127)

where we used the smoothness of the loss function fğ‘“f (Assumption 2) and the result in (68) to derive inequality (a)ğ‘(a). To bound the second term in (124), i.e. ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğk(i)âˆ¥2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğğ‘–ğ‘˜2\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{e}}^{(i)}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2}, we can employ our result in (111) for the special case n=1ğ‘›1n=1. It yields that for Î·kâ‰¤1/Lâ€‹Ï„subscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜1ğ¿ğœ\eta_{k}\leq\nicefrac{{1}}{{L\tau}},

ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğk(i)âˆ¥2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğğ‘–ğ‘˜2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{e}}^{(i)}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2} â‰¤Ï„2â€‹Ïƒ2+Ï„2â€‹(Ï„âˆ’1)â€‹L2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹eâ€‹Î·k2.absentsuperscriptğœ2superscriptğœ2superscriptğœ2ğœ1superscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ2ğ‘’superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2\displaystyle\leq\tau^{2}\sigma^{2}+\tau^{2}(\tau-1)L^{2}\sigma^{2}e\eta_{k}^{2}. (128)

Plugging (127) and (128) in (124) implies that

ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ±kâˆ¥2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptğ±ğ‘˜2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\mathbf{x}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2} â‰¤2â€‹Ï„2â€‹L2â€‹Î·k2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±kâˆ’ğ±âˆ—âˆ¥2+2â€‹Ï„2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Î·k2+2â€‹(Ï„âˆ’1)â€‹Ï„2â€‹L2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹eâ€‹Î·k4,absent2superscriptğœ2superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ±ğ‘˜superscriptğ±22superscriptğœ2superscriptğœ2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜22ğœ1superscriptğœ2superscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ2ğ‘’superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜4\displaystyle\leq 2\tau^{2}L^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}_{k}-\mathbf{x}^{*}\right\rVert}^{2}+2\tau^{2}\sigma^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}+2(\tau-1)\tau^{2}L^{2}\sigma^{2}e\eta_{k}^{4}, (129)

which together with (119) concludes Lemma 3:

ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±^k+1âˆ’ğ±Â¯k,Ï„âˆ¥2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğœ2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1}-\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,\tau}\right\rVert}^{2} â‰¤2â€‹qnâ€‹Ï„2â€‹L2â€‹Î·k2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±kâˆ’ğ±âˆ—âˆ¥2+2â€‹qâ€‹Ï„2â€‹Ïƒ2nâ€‹Î·k2+2â€‹qâ€‹(Ï„âˆ’1)â€‹Ï„2â€‹L2â€‹Ïƒ2nâ€‹eâ€‹Î·k4.absent2ğ‘ğ‘›superscriptğœ2superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ±ğ‘˜superscriptğ±22ğ‘superscriptğœ2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜22ğ‘ğœ1superscriptğœ2superscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›ğ‘’superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜4\displaystyle\leq 2\frac{q}{n}\tau^{2}L^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}_{k}-\mathbf{x}^{*}\right\rVert}^{2}+2q\tau^{2}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}\eta_{k}^{2}+2q(\tau-1)\tau^{2}L^{2}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}e\eta_{k}^{4}. (130)

7.4 Proof of Lemma 4

For each node iâˆˆ[n]ğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›i\in[n] denote ğ³k,Ï„(i)=Qâ€‹(ğ±k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ±k)subscriptsuperscriptğ³ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœğ‘„subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptğ±ğ‘˜{\mathbf{z}}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}=Q(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\mathbf{x}_{k}) and ğ³Â¯k,Ï„=1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ³k,Ï„(i)subscriptÂ¯ğ³ğ‘˜ğœ1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›subscriptsuperscriptğ³ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœ\overline{\mathbf{z}}_{k,\tau}=\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}{\mathbf{z}}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}. Then,

ğ”¼ğ’®kâ€‹âˆ¥ğ±k+1âˆ’ğ±^k+1âˆ¥2subscriptğ”¼subscriptğ’®ğ‘˜superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ±ğ‘˜1subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜12\displaystyle\mathbb{E}_{{\mathcal{S}}_{k}}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}_{k+1}-\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1}\right\rVert}^{2} =ğ”¼ğ’®kâ€‹âˆ¥1râ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®kğ³k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ³Â¯k,Ï„âˆ¥2absentsubscriptğ”¼subscriptğ’®ğ‘˜superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘Ÿsubscriptğ‘–subscriptğ’®ğ‘˜subscriptsuperscriptğ³ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptÂ¯ğ³ğ‘˜ğœ2\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}_{{\mathcal{S}}_{k}}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\frac{1}{r}\sum_{i\in{\mathcal{S}}_{k}}{\mathbf{z}}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\overline{\mathbf{z}}_{k,\tau}\right\rVert}^{2} (131)
=1r2â€‹ğ”¼ğ’®kâ€‹âˆ¥âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğŸ™â€‹{iâˆˆğ’®k}â€‹(ğ³k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ³Â¯k,Ï„)âˆ¥2absent1superscriptğ‘Ÿ2subscriptğ”¼subscriptğ’®ğ‘˜superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›1ğ‘–subscriptğ’®ğ‘˜subscriptsuperscriptğ³ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptÂ¯ğ³ğ‘˜ğœ2\displaystyle=\frac{1}{r^{2}}\mathbb{E}_{{\mathcal{S}}_{k}}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbbm{1}\{i\in{\mathcal{S}}_{k}\}\left({\mathbf{z}}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\overline{\mathbf{z}}_{k,\tau}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (132)
=1r2{âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]Pr[iâˆˆğ’®k]âˆ¥ğ³k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ³Â¯k,Ï„âˆ¥2\displaystyle=\frac{1}{r^{2}}\Bigg{\{}\sum_{i\in[n]}\text{Pr}\left[i\in{\mathcal{S}}_{k}\right]\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{z}}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\overline{\mathbf{z}}_{k,\tau}\right\rVert}^{2} (133)
+âˆ‘iâ‰ jPr[i,jâˆˆğ’®k]âŸ¨ğ³k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ³Â¯k,Ï„,ğ³k,Ï„(j)âˆ’ğ³Â¯k,Ï„âŸ©}\displaystyle\quad+\sum_{i\neq j}\text{Pr}\left[i,j\in{\mathcal{S}}_{k}\right]\left\langle{\mathbf{z}}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\overline{\mathbf{z}}_{k,\tau},{\mathbf{z}}^{(j)}_{k,\tau}-\overline{\mathbf{z}}_{k,\tau}\right\rangle\Bigg{\}} (134)
=1nâ€‹râ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ¥ğ³k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ³Â¯k,Ï„âˆ¥2absent1ğ‘›ğ‘Ÿsubscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğ³ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptÂ¯ğ³ğ‘˜ğœ2\displaystyle=\frac{1}{nr}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{z}}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\overline{\mathbf{z}}_{k,\tau}\right\rVert}^{2} (135)
+râˆ’1râ€‹nâ€‹(nâˆ’1)â€‹âˆ‘iâ‰ jâŸ¨ğ³k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ³Â¯k,Ï„,ğ³k,Ï„(j)âˆ’ğ³Â¯k,Ï„âŸ©ğ‘Ÿ1ğ‘Ÿğ‘›ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘–ğ‘—subscriptsuperscriptğ³ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptÂ¯ğ³ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptsuperscriptğ³ğ‘—ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptÂ¯ğ³ğ‘˜ğœ\displaystyle\quad+\frac{r-1}{rn(n-1)}\sum_{i\neq j}\left\langle{\mathbf{z}}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\overline{\mathbf{z}}_{k,\tau},{\mathbf{z}}^{(j)}_{k,\tau}-\overline{\mathbf{z}}_{k,\tau}\right\rangle (136)
=1râ€‹(nâˆ’1)â€‹(1âˆ’rn)â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ¥ğ³k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ³Â¯k,Ï„âˆ¥2,absent1ğ‘Ÿğ‘›11ğ‘Ÿğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğ³ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptÂ¯ğ³ğ‘˜ğœ2\displaystyle=\frac{1}{r(n-1)}\left(1-\frac{r}{n}\right)\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{z}}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\overline{\mathbf{z}}_{k,\tau}\right\rVert}^{2}, (137)

where we used the fact that âˆ¥ğ³k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ³Â¯k,Ï„âˆ¥2+âˆ‘iâ‰ jâŸ¨ğ³k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ³Â¯k,Ï„,ğ³k,Ï„(j)âˆ’ğ³Â¯k,Ï„âŸ©=0superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğ³ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptÂ¯ğ³ğ‘˜ğœ2subscriptğ‘–ğ‘—subscriptsuperscriptğ³ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptÂ¯ğ³ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptsuperscriptğ³ğ‘—ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptÂ¯ğ³ğ‘˜ğœ0\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{z}}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\overline{\mathbf{z}}_{k,\tau}\right\rVert}^{2}+\sum_{i\neq j}\left\langle{\mathbf{z}}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\overline{\mathbf{z}}_{k,\tau},{\mathbf{z}}^{(j)}_{k,\tau}-\overline{\mathbf{z}}_{k,\tau}\right\rangle=0. Further taking expectation with respect to the quantizer yields

âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼Qâ€‹âˆ¥ğ³k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ³Â¯k,Ï„âˆ¥2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›subscriptğ”¼ğ‘„superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğ³ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptÂ¯ğ³ğ‘˜ğœ2\displaystyle\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}_{Q}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{z}}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\overline{\mathbf{z}}_{k,\tau}\right\rVert}^{2} â‰¤2â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼Qâ€‹âˆ¥ğ³k,Ï„(i)âˆ¥2+2â€‹nâ€‹ğ”¼Qâ€‹âˆ¥ğ³Â¯k,Ï„âˆ¥2absent2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›subscriptğ”¼ğ‘„superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğ³ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœ22ğ‘›subscriptğ”¼ğ‘„superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptÂ¯ğ³ğ‘˜ğœ2\displaystyle\leq 2\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}_{Q}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{z}}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}\right\rVert}^{2}+2n\mathbb{E}_{Q}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\overline{\mathbf{z}}_{k,\tau}\right\rVert}^{2} (138)
â‰¤4â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼Qâ€‹âˆ¥ğ³k,Ï„(i)âˆ¥2absent4subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›subscriptğ”¼ğ‘„superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğ³ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœ2\displaystyle\leq 4\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}_{Q}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{z}}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}\right\rVert}^{2} (139)
=4â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼Qâ€‹âˆ¥Qâ€‹(ğ±k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ±k)âˆ¥2absent4subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›subscriptğ”¼ğ‘„superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘„subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptğ±ğ‘˜2\displaystyle=4\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}_{Q}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert Q\left(\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\mathbf{x}_{k}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (140)
â‰¤4â€‹(1+q)â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ¥ğ±k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ±kâˆ¥2.absent41ğ‘subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptğ±ğ‘˜2\displaystyle\leq 4(1+q)\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\mathbf{x}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2}. (141)

In the above derivations, we used the fact that under Assumption 1 and for any ğ±ğ±\mathbf{x} we have ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥Qâ€‹(ğ±)âˆ¥2â‰¤(1+q)â€‹âˆ¥ğ±âˆ¥2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ‘„ğ±21ğ‘superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ±2\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert Q(\mathbf{x})\right\rVert}^{2}\leq(1+q)\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}\right\rVert}^{2}. Therefore, (141) together with the equality derived in (137) yields that

ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±k+1âˆ’ğ±^k+1âˆ¥2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ±ğ‘˜1subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜12\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}_{k+1}-\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1}\right\rVert}^{2} â‰¤1râ€‹(nâˆ’1)â€‹(1âˆ’rn)â€‹4â€‹(1+q)â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±k,Ï„(i)âˆ’ğ±kâˆ¥2.absent1ğ‘Ÿğ‘›11ğ‘Ÿğ‘›41ğ‘subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğœsubscriptğ±ğ‘˜2\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{r(n-1)}\left(1-\frac{r}{n}\right)4(1+q)\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}^{(i)}_{k,\tau}-\mathbf{x}_{k}\right\rVert}^{2}. (142)

Finally, we substitute the bound in (129) into (142) and conclude Lemma 4 as follows:

ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±k+1âˆ’ğ±^k+1âˆ¥2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ±ğ‘˜1subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜12\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}_{k+1}-\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1}\right\rVert}^{2} â‰¤nâˆ’rrâ€‹(nâˆ’1)â€‹8â€‹(1+q)â€‹{Ï„2â€‹L2â€‹Î·2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±kâˆ’ğ±âˆ—âˆ¥2+Ï„2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Î·2+(Ï„âˆ’1)â€‹Ï„2â€‹L2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹eâ€‹Î·4}.absentğ‘›ğ‘Ÿğ‘Ÿğ‘›181ğ‘superscriptğœ2superscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ±ğ‘˜superscriptğ±2superscriptğœ2superscriptğœ2superscriptğœ‚2ğœ1superscriptğœ2superscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ2ğ‘’superscriptğœ‚4\displaystyle\leq\frac{n-r}{r(n-1)}8(1+q)\left\{\tau^{2}L^{2}\eta^{2}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}_{k}-\mathbf{x}^{*}\right\rVert}^{2}+\tau^{2}\sigma^{2}\eta^{2}+(\tau-1)\tau^{2}L^{2}\sigma^{2}e\eta^{4}\right\}. (143)

7.5 Proof of Equation (95)

Let us fix the period kğ‘˜k and for simplicity of the notations in this proof, let us take at=ak,tsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘ğ‘˜ğ‘¡a_{t}=a_{k,t} and Î·=Î·kğœ‚subscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜\eta=\eta_{k}. We showed that atâ‰¤Ï„â€‹Î·2â€‹Ïƒ2+Ï„â€‹L2â€‹Î·2â€‹(a1+â‹¯+atâˆ’1)subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğœsuperscriptğœ‚2superscriptğœ2ğœsuperscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ‚2subscriptğ‘1â‹¯subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡1a_{t}\leq\tau\eta^{2}\sigma^{2}+\tau L^{2}\eta^{2}\left(a_{1}+\cdots+a_{t-1}\right) for every t=2,â‹¯,Ï„âˆ’1ğ‘¡2â‹¯ğœ1t=2,\cdots,\tau-1 and also a1â‰¤Î·2â€‹Ïƒ2subscriptğ‘1superscriptğœ‚2superscriptğœ2a_{1}\leq\eta^{2}\sigma^{2}. For t=1ğ‘¡1t=1, (95) holds. Assume that (95) holds also for {a1,â‹¯,atâˆ’1}subscriptğ‘1â‹¯subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡1\{a_{1},\cdots,a_{t-1}\}. Now, for atsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡a_{t} we have

atsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡\displaystyle a_{t} â‰¤Ï„â€‹Î·2â€‹Ïƒ2+Ï„â€‹L2â€‹Î·2â€‹(a1+â‹¯+atâˆ’1)absentğœsuperscriptğœ‚2superscriptğœ2ğœsuperscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ‚2subscriptğ‘1â‹¯subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡1\displaystyle\leq\tau\eta^{2}\sigma^{2}+\tau L^{2}\eta^{2}\left(a_{1}+\cdots+a_{t-1}\right) (144)
â‰¤Ï„â€‹Î·2â€‹Ïƒ2+Ï„â€‹L2â€‹Î·2â€‹âˆ‘i=0tâˆ’2Ï„â€‹Î·2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹(1+Ï„â€‹L2â€‹Î·2)iabsentğœsuperscriptğœ‚2superscriptğœ2ğœsuperscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–0ğ‘¡2ğœsuperscriptğœ‚2superscriptğœ2superscript1ğœsuperscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ‚2ğ‘–\displaystyle\leq\tau\eta^{2}\sigma^{2}+\tau L^{2}\eta^{2}\sum_{i=0}^{t-2}\tau\eta^{2}\sigma^{2}\left(1+\tau L^{2}\eta^{2}\right)^{i} (145)
=Ï„â€‹Î·2â€‹Ïƒ2+Ï„â€‹Î·2â€‹Ïƒ2â‹…Ï„â€‹L2â€‹Î·2â‹…(1+Ï„â€‹L2â€‹Î·2)tâˆ’1âˆ’1Ï„â€‹L2â€‹Î·2absentğœsuperscriptğœ‚2superscriptğœ2â‹…â‹…ğœsuperscriptğœ‚2superscriptğœ2ğœsuperscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ‚2superscript1ğœsuperscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ‚2ğ‘¡11ğœsuperscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ‚2\displaystyle=\tau\eta^{2}\sigma^{2}+\tau\eta^{2}\sigma^{2}\cdot\tau L^{2}\eta^{2}\cdot\frac{\left(1+\tau L^{2}\eta^{2}\right)^{t-1}-1}{\tau L^{2}\eta^{2}} (146)
=Ï„â€‹Î·2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹(1+Ï„â€‹L2â€‹Î·2)tâˆ’1,absentğœsuperscriptğœ‚2superscriptğœ2superscript1ğœsuperscriptğ¿2superscriptğœ‚2ğ‘¡1\displaystyle=\tau\eta^{2}\sigma^{2}\left(1+\tau L^{2}\eta^{2}\right)^{t-1}, (147)

as desired. Therefore, (95) holds for every t=1,â‹¯,Ï„âˆ’1ğ‘¡1â‹¯ğœ1t=1,\cdots,\tau-1.

7.6 Discussion on stepsize Î·ksubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜\eta_{k}

Here we show that for any kâ‰¥k0ğ‘˜subscriptğ‘˜0k\geq k_{0} we have C0â‰¤1âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Ï„â€‹Î·ksubscriptğ¶0112ğœ‡ğœsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜C_{0}\leq 1-\frac{1}{2}\mu\tau\eta_{k}, where k0subscriptğ‘˜0k_{0} satisfies the condition in Theorem 1, that is

k0â‰¥4â€‹maxâ¡{LÎ¼,4â€‹(B1Î¼2+1),1Ï„,4â€‹nÎ¼2â€‹Ï„}.subscriptğ‘˜04ğ¿ğœ‡4subscriptğµ1superscriptğœ‡211ğœ4ğ‘›superscriptğœ‡2ğœ\displaystyle k_{0}\geq 4\max\left\{\frac{L}{\mu},4\left(\frac{B_{1}}{\mu^{2}}+1\right),\frac{1}{\tau},\frac{4n}{\mu^{2}\tau}\right\}. (148)

First note that this condition on k0subscriptğ‘˜0k_{0} implies the following conditions on the stepsize Î·k=4â€‹Î¼âˆ’1/kâ€‹Ï„+1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜4superscriptğœ‡1ğ‘˜ğœ1\eta_{k}=\nicefrac{{4\mu^{-1}}}{{k\tau+1}} for kâ‰¥k0ğ‘˜subscriptğ‘˜0k\geq k_{0}:

Î·kâ€‹Ï„â‰¤minâ¡{1L,Î¼4â€‹(Î¼2+B1)},Â andÂ Î·kâ‰¤minâ¡{Î¼L2,Î¼4â€‹n},formulae-sequencesubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜ğœ1ğ¿ğœ‡4superscriptğœ‡2subscriptğµ1Â andÂ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜ğœ‡superscriptğ¿2ğœ‡4ğ‘›\displaystyle\eta_{k}\tau\leq\min\left\{\frac{1}{L},\frac{\mu}{4\left(\mu^{2}+B_{1}\right)}\right\},\quad\text{ and }\quad\eta_{k}\leq\min\left\{\frac{\mu}{L^{2}},\frac{\mu}{4n}\right\}, (149)

Now consider the term (1âˆ’Î¼â€‹Î·k)Ï„superscript1ğœ‡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜ğœ(1-\mu\eta_{k})^{\tau} in C0subscriptğ¶0C_{0}. We have

(1âˆ’Î¼â€‹Î·k)Ï„superscript1ğœ‡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜ğœ\displaystyle\left(1-\mu\eta_{k}\right)^{\tau} =(1âˆ’Î¼â€‹Ï„â€‹Î·kÏ„)Ï„absentsuperscript1ğœ‡ğœsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜ğœğœ\displaystyle=\left(1-\frac{\mu\tau\eta_{k}}{\tau}\right)^{\tau} (150)
â‰¤eâˆ’Î¼â€‹Ï„â€‹Î·kabsentsuperscriptğ‘’ğœ‡ğœsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜\displaystyle\leq e^{-\mu\tau\eta_{k}} (151)
â‰¤1âˆ’Î¼â€‹Ï„â€‹Î·k+Î¼2â€‹Ï„2â€‹Î·k2,absent1ğœ‡ğœsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜superscriptğœ‡2superscriptğœ2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2\displaystyle\leq 1-\mu\tau\eta_{k}+\mu^{2}\tau^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}, (152)

where the first inequality follows from the assumption Î·kâ‰¤1/Î¼subscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜1ğœ‡\eta_{k}\leq\nicefrac{{1}}{{\mu}} and the second inequality uses the fact that exâ‰¤1+x+x2superscriptğ‘’ğ‘¥1ğ‘¥superscriptğ‘¥2e^{x}\leq 1+x+x^{2} for xâ‰¤0ğ‘¥0x\leq 0. Therefore,

C0subscriptğ¶0\displaystyle C_{0} â‰¤(1+nâ€‹Î·k2)â€‹(1âˆ’Î¼â€‹Ï„â€‹Î·k+Î¼2â€‹Ï„2â€‹Î·k2)+B1â€‹Ï„2â€‹Î·k2absent1ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜21ğœ‡ğœsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜superscriptğœ‡2superscriptğœ2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2subscriptğµ1superscriptğœ2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2\displaystyle\leq\left(1+n\eta_{k}^{2}\right)\left(1-\mu\tau\eta_{k}+\mu^{2}\tau^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}\right)+B_{1}\tau^{2}\eta_{k}^{2} (153)
=1âˆ’Î¼â€‹Ï„â€‹Î·k+Ï„2â€‹Î·k2â€‹(B1+Î¼2)+nâ€‹Î·k2â€‹(1âˆ’Î¼â€‹Ï„â€‹Î·k+Î¼2â€‹Ï„2â€‹Î·k2).absent1ğœ‡ğœsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜superscriptğœ2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2subscriptğµ1superscriptğœ‡2ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜21ğœ‡ğœsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜superscriptğœ‡2superscriptğœ2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2\displaystyle=1-\mu\tau\eta_{k}+\tau^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}(B_{1}+\mu^{2})+n\eta_{k}^{2}\left(1-\mu\tau\eta_{k}+\mu^{2}\tau^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}\right). (154)

Note that from the assumption Î·kâ‰¤1/Lâ€‹Ï„subscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜1ğ¿ğœ\eta_{k}\leq\nicefrac{{1}}{{L\tau}} we have 0â‰¤Î¼â€‹Ï„â€‹Î·kâ‰¤Î¼/Lâ‰¤10ğœ‡ğœsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜ğœ‡ğ¿10\leq\mu\tau\eta_{k}\leq\nicefrac{{\mu}}{{L}}\leq 1. This implies that 1âˆ’Î¼â€‹Ï„â€‹Î·k+Î¼2â€‹Ï„2â€‹Î·k2â‰¤11ğœ‡ğœsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜superscriptğœ‡2superscriptğœ2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜211-\mu\tau\eta_{k}+\mu^{2}\tau^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}\leq 1. Hence,

C0â‰¤1âˆ’Î¼â€‹Ï„â€‹Î·k+Ï„2â€‹Î·k2â€‹(B1+Î¼2)+nâ€‹Î·k2.subscriptğ¶01ğœ‡ğœsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜superscriptğœ2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2subscriptğµ1superscriptğœ‡2ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2\displaystyle C_{0}\leq 1-\mu\tau\eta_{k}+\tau^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}(B_{1}+\mu^{2})+n\eta_{k}^{2}. (155)

Now from the condition Î·kâ€‹Ï„â‰¤Î¼/4â€‹(B1+Î¼2)subscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜ğœğœ‡4subscriptğµ1superscriptğœ‡2\eta_{k}\tau\leq\nicefrac{{\mu}}{{4(B_{1}+\mu^{2})}} we have

Ï„2â€‹Î·k2â€‹(B1+Î¼2)â‰¤14â€‹Î¼â€‹Ï„â€‹Î·k,superscriptğœ2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜2subscriptğµ1superscriptğœ‡214ğœ‡ğœsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜\displaystyle\tau^{2}\eta_{k}^{2}(B_{1}+\mu^{2})\leq\frac{1}{4}\mu\tau\eta_{k}, (156)

and from Î·kâ‰¤Î¼/4â€‹nsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜ğœ‡4ğ‘›\eta_{k}\leq\nicefrac{{\mu}}{{4n}} we have

nâ€‹Î·k2â‰¤14â€‹Î¼â€‹Ï„â€‹Î·k,ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜214ğœ‡ğœsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜\displaystyle n\eta_{k}^{2}\leq\frac{1}{4}\mu\tau\eta_{k}, (157)

sine Ï„â‰¥1ğœ1\tau\geq 1. Plugging (156) and (157) in (155) yields that for any kâ‰¥k0ğ‘˜subscriptğ‘˜0k\geq k_{0} we have C0â‰¤1âˆ’12â€‹Î¼â€‹Ï„â€‹Î·ksubscriptğ¶0112ğœ‡ğœsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘˜C_{0}\leq 1-\frac{1}{2}\mu\tau\eta_{k}.

7.7 Skipped lemmas and proofs

Lemma 5.

Let a non-negative sequence Î´ksubscriptğ›¿ğ‘˜\delta_{k} satisfy the following

Î´k+1â‰¤(1âˆ’2k+k1)â€‹Î´k+a(k+k1)2+b(k+k1)4,subscriptğ›¿ğ‘˜112ğ‘˜subscriptğ‘˜1subscriptğ›¿ğ‘˜ğ‘superscriptğ‘˜subscriptğ‘˜12ğ‘superscriptğ‘˜subscriptğ‘˜14\displaystyle\delta_{k+1}\leq\left(1-\frac{2}{k+k_{1}}\right)\delta_{k}+\frac{a}{(k+k_{1})^{2}}+\frac{b}{(k+k_{1})^{4}}, (158)

for every kâ‰¥k0ğ‘˜subscriptğ‘˜0k\geq k_{0}, where a,b,c,k1ğ‘ğ‘ğ‘subscriptğ‘˜1a,b,c,k_{1} are positive reals and k0subscriptğ‘˜0k_{0} is a positive integer. Then for every kâ‰¥k0ğ‘˜subscriptğ‘˜0k\geq k_{0} we have

Î´kâ‰¤(k0+k1)2(k+k1)2â€‹Î´k0+ak+k1+b(k+k1)2.subscriptğ›¿ğ‘˜superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0subscriptğ‘˜12superscriptğ‘˜subscriptğ‘˜12subscriptğ›¿subscriptğ‘˜0ğ‘ğ‘˜subscriptğ‘˜1ğ‘superscriptğ‘˜subscriptğ‘˜12\displaystyle\delta_{k}\leq\frac{(k_{0}+k_{1})^{2}}{(k+k_{1})^{2}}\delta_{k_{0}}+\frac{a}{k+k_{1}}+\frac{b}{(k+k_{1})^{2}}. (159)
Proof.

We prove by induction on kâ‰¥k0ğ‘˜subscriptğ‘˜0k\geq k_{0}. The claim in (159) is trivial for k=k0ğ‘˜subscriptğ‘˜0k=k_{0}. Let (159) hold for sâ‰¥k0ğ‘ subscriptğ‘˜0s\geq k_{0}, that is

Î´sâ‰¤(k0+k1)2(s+k1)2â€‹Î´k0+as+k1+b(s+k1)2.subscriptğ›¿ğ‘ superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0subscriptğ‘˜12superscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘˜12subscriptğ›¿subscriptğ‘˜0ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğ‘˜1ğ‘superscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘˜12\displaystyle\delta_{s}\leq\frac{(k_{0}+k_{1})^{2}}{(s+k_{1})^{2}}\delta_{k_{0}}+\frac{a}{s+k_{1}}+\frac{b}{(s+k_{1})^{2}}. (160)

We can then write

Î´s+1subscriptğ›¿ğ‘ 1\displaystyle\delta_{s+1} â‰¤(1âˆ’2s+k1)â€‹Î´s+as+k1+b(s+k1)2absent12ğ‘ subscriptğ‘˜1subscriptğ›¿ğ‘ ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğ‘˜1ğ‘superscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘˜12\displaystyle\leq\left(1-\frac{2}{s+k_{1}}\right)\delta_{s}+\frac{a}{s+k_{1}}+\frac{b}{(s+k_{1})^{2}} (161)
â‰¤(1âˆ’2s+k1)â€‹((k0+k1)2(s+k1)2â€‹Î´k0+as+k1+b(s+k1)2)+a(s+k1)2+b(s+k1)4absent12ğ‘ subscriptğ‘˜1superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0subscriptğ‘˜12superscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘˜12subscriptğ›¿subscriptğ‘˜0ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğ‘˜1ğ‘superscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘˜12ğ‘superscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘˜12ğ‘superscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘˜14\displaystyle\leq\left(1-\frac{2}{s+k_{1}}\right)\left(\frac{(k_{0}+k_{1})^{2}}{(s+k_{1})^{2}}\delta_{k_{0}}+\frac{a}{s+k_{1}}+\frac{b}{(s+k_{1})^{2}}\right)+\frac{a}{(s+k_{1})^{2}}+\frac{b}{(s+k_{1})^{4}} (162)
=s+k1âˆ’2(s+k1)3â€‹(k0+k1)2â€‹Î´k0+s+k1âˆ’1(s+k1)2â€‹a+(s+k1âˆ’1)2(s+k1)4â€‹b.absentğ‘ subscriptğ‘˜12superscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘˜13superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0subscriptğ‘˜12subscriptğ›¿subscriptğ‘˜0ğ‘ subscriptğ‘˜11superscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘˜12ğ‘superscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘˜112superscriptğ‘ subscriptğ‘˜14ğ‘\displaystyle=\frac{s+k_{1}-2}{(s+k_{1})^{3}}(k_{0}+k_{1})^{2}\delta_{k_{0}}+\frac{s+k_{1}-1}{(s+k_{1})^{2}}a+\frac{(s+k_{1}-1)^{2}}{(s+k_{1})^{4}}b. (163)

Now, take sâ€²=s+k1superscriptğ‘ â€²ğ‘ subscriptğ‘˜1s^{\prime}=s+k_{1}. We have for sâ€²â‰¥1superscriptğ‘ â€²1s^{\prime}\geq 1 that

sâ€²âˆ’2sâ€²â£3â‰¤1(sâ€²+1)2,sâ€²âˆ’1sâ€²â£2â‰¤1sâ€²+1,(sâ€²âˆ’1)2sâ€²â£4â‰¤1(sâ€²+1)2.formulae-sequencesuperscriptğ‘ â€²2superscriptğ‘ â€²31superscriptsuperscriptğ‘ â€²12formulae-sequencesuperscriptğ‘ â€²1superscriptğ‘ â€²21superscriptğ‘ â€²1superscriptsuperscriptğ‘ â€²12superscriptğ‘ â€²41superscriptsuperscriptğ‘ â€²12\displaystyle\frac{s^{\prime}-2}{s^{\prime 3}}\leq\frac{1}{(s^{\prime}+1)^{2}},\quad\quad\frac{s^{\prime}-1}{s^{\prime 2}}\leq\frac{1}{s^{\prime}+1},\quad\quad\frac{(s^{\prime}-1)^{2}}{s^{\prime 4}}\leq\frac{1}{(s^{\prime}+1)^{2}}. (164)

Plugging (164) in (163) yields that the claim in (159) holds for s+1ğ‘ 1s+1 and hence for any kâ‰¥k0ğ‘˜subscriptğ‘˜0k\geq k_{0}. âˆ

8 Proof of Theorem 2

We begin the proof of Theorem 2 by noting the following property for any smooth loss function.

Lemma 6.

Consider the sequences of updates {ğ±k+1,ğ±^k+1,ğ±Â¯k,Ï„}subscriptğ±ğ‘˜1subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğœ\{\mathbf{x}_{k+1},\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1},\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,\tau}\} generated by FedPAQ method in Algorithm 1. If Assumptions 1 and 2 hold, then

ğ”¼â€‹fâ€‹(ğ±k+1)ğ”¼ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘˜1\displaystyle\mathbb{E}f(\mathbf{x}_{k+1}) â‰¤ğ”¼â€‹fâ€‹(ğ±Â¯k,Ï„)+L2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±^k+1âˆ’ğ±Â¯k,Ï„âˆ¥2+L2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±^k+1âˆ’ğ±k+1âˆ¥2,absentğ”¼ğ‘“subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğœğ¿2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğœ2ğ¿2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1subscriptğ±ğ‘˜12\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}f(\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,\tau})+\frac{L}{2}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1}-\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,\tau}\right\rVert}^{2}+\frac{L}{2}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1}-\mathbf{x}_{k+1}\right\rVert}^{2}, (165)

for any period k=0,â‹¯,Kâˆ’1ğ‘˜0â‹¯ğ¾1k=0,\cdots,K-1.

Proof.

See Section 8.2. âˆ

In the following three lemmas, we bound each of the three terms in the RHS of (165).

Lemma 7.

Let Assumptions 2 and 3 hold and consider the sequence of updates in FedPAQ method with stepsize Î·ğœ‚\eta. Then, for every period k=0,â‹¯,Kâˆ’1ğ‘˜0â‹¯ğ¾1k=0,\cdots,K-1 we have

ğ”¼â€‹fâ€‹(ğ±Â¯k,Ï„)ğ”¼ğ‘“subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğœ\displaystyle\mathbb{E}f(\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,\tau}) â‰¤ğ”¼â€‹fâ€‹(ğ±k)âˆ’12â€‹Î·â€‹âˆ‘t=0Ï„âˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±Â¯k,t)âˆ¥2absentğ”¼ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘˜12ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğœ1ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}f(\mathbf{x}_{k})-\frac{1}{2}\eta\sum_{t=0}^{\tau-1}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f(\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t})\right\rVert}^{2} (166)
âˆ’Î·â€‹(12â€‹nâˆ’12â€‹nâ€‹Lâ€‹Î·âˆ’1nâ€‹L2â€‹Ï„â€‹(Ï„âˆ’1)â€‹Î·2)â€‹âˆ‘t=0Ï„âˆ’1âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ¥2ğœ‚12ğ‘›12ğ‘›ğ¿ğœ‚1ğ‘›superscriptğ¿2ğœğœ1superscriptğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğœ1subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\quad-\eta\left(\frac{1}{2n}-\frac{1}{2n}L\eta-\frac{1}{n}L^{2}\tau(\tau-1)\eta^{2}\right)\sum_{t=0}^{\tau-1}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (167)
+Î·2â€‹L2â€‹Ïƒ2nâ€‹Ï„+Î·3â€‹Ïƒ2nâ€‹(n+1)â€‹Ï„â€‹(Ï„âˆ’1)2â€‹L2.superscriptğœ‚2ğ¿2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›ğœsuperscriptğœ‚3superscriptğœ2ğ‘›ğ‘›1ğœğœ12superscriptğ¿2\displaystyle\quad+\eta^{2}\frac{L}{2}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}\tau+\eta^{3}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}(n+1)\frac{\tau(\tau-1)}{2}L^{2}. (168)
Proof.

See Section 8.3. âˆ

Lemma 8.

If Assumptions 1 and 3 hold, then for sequences {ğ±^k+1,ğ±Â¯k,Ï„}subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğœ\{\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1},\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,\tau}\} defined in (24) we have

ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±^k+1âˆ’ğ±Â¯k,Ï„âˆ¥2â‰¤qâ€‹Ïƒ2nâ€‹Ï„â€‹Î·2+qâ€‹1n2â€‹Ï„â€‹Î·2â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ‘t=0Ï„âˆ’1âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ¥2.ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğœ2ğ‘superscriptğœ2ğ‘›ğœsuperscriptğœ‚2ğ‘1superscriptğ‘›2ğœsuperscriptğœ‚2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğœ1superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1}-\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,\tau}\right\rVert}^{2}\leq q\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}\tau\eta^{2}+q\frac{1}{n^{2}}\tau\eta^{2}\sum_{i\in[n]}\sum_{t=0}^{\tau-1}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}. (169)
Proof.

See Section 8.4. âˆ

Lemma 9.

Under Assumptions 1 and 3, for the sequence of averages {ğ±^k+1}subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1\{\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1}\} defined in (24) we have

ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±^k+1âˆ’ğ±k+1âˆ¥2â‰¤1râ€‹(nâˆ’1)â€‹(1âˆ’rn)â€‹4â€‹(1+q)â€‹{nâ€‹Ïƒ2â€‹Ï„â€‹Î·2+Ï„â€‹Î·2â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ‘t=0Ï„âˆ’1âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ¥2}.ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1subscriptğ±ğ‘˜121ğ‘Ÿğ‘›11ğ‘Ÿğ‘›41ğ‘ğ‘›superscriptğœ2ğœsuperscriptğœ‚2ğœsuperscriptğœ‚2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğœ1superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1}-\mathbf{x}_{k+1}\right\rVert}^{2}\leq\frac{1}{r(n-1)}\left(1-\frac{r}{n}\right)4(1+q)\left\{n\sigma^{2}\tau\eta^{2}+\tau\eta^{2}\sum_{i\in[n]}\sum_{t=0}^{\tau-1}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}\right\}. (170)
Proof.

See Section 8.5. âˆ

After establishing the main building modules in the above lemmas, we now proceed to prove the convergence rate in Theorem 2. In particular, we combine the results in Lemmas 6â€“9 to derive the following recursive inequality on the expected function value on the models updated at the parameter servers, i.e. {ğ±k:k=1,â‹¯,K}formulae-sequence:subscriptğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘˜1â‹¯ğ¾\{\mathbf{x}_{k}\mathrel{\mathop{\mathchar 58\relax}}k=1,\cdots,K\}:

ğ”¼â€‹fâ€‹(ğ±k+1)â‰¤ğ”¼â€‹fâ€‹(ğ±k)ğ”¼ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘˜1ğ”¼ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘˜\displaystyle\mathbb{E}f(\mathbf{x}_{k+1})\leq\mathbb{E}f(\mathbf{x}_{k}) (171)
âˆ’12â€‹Î·â€‹âˆ‘t=0Ï„âˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±Â¯k,t)âˆ¥212ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğœ1ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\quad-\frac{1}{2}\eta\sum_{t=0}^{\tau-1}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f(\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t})\right\rVert}^{2} (172)
âˆ’Î·â€‹12â€‹nâ€‹(1âˆ’Lâ€‹(1+1nâ€‹qâ€‹Ï„+4â€‹nâˆ’rrâ€‹(nâˆ’1)â€‹(1+q)â€‹Ï„)â€‹Î·âˆ’2â€‹L2â€‹Ï„â€‹(Ï„âˆ’1)â€‹Î·2)â€‹âˆ‘t=0Ï„âˆ’1âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ¥2ğœ‚12ğ‘›1ğ¿11ğ‘›ğ‘ğœ4ğ‘›ğ‘Ÿğ‘Ÿğ‘›11ğ‘ğœğœ‚2superscriptğ¿2ğœğœ1superscriptğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğœ1subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\quad-\eta\frac{1}{2n}\left(1-L\left(1+\frac{1}{n}q\tau+4\frac{n-r}{r(n-1)}(1+q)\tau\right)\eta-2L^{2}\tau(\tau-1)\eta^{2}\right)\sum_{t=0}^{\tau-1}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (173)
+Î·2â€‹L2â€‹(1+q)â€‹Ï„â€‹(Ïƒ2m+4â€‹Ïƒ2râ€‹nâˆ’rnâˆ’1)+Î·3â€‹Ïƒ2mâ€‹(m+1)â€‹Ï„â€‹(Ï„âˆ’1)2â€‹L2.superscriptğœ‚2ğ¿21ğ‘ğœsuperscriptğœ2ğ‘š4superscriptğœ2ğ‘Ÿğ‘›ğ‘Ÿğ‘›1superscriptğœ‚3superscriptğœ2ğ‘šğ‘š1ğœğœ12superscriptğ¿2\displaystyle\quad+\eta^{2}\frac{L}{2}(1+q)\tau\left(\frac{\sigma^{2}}{m}+4\frac{\sigma^{2}}{r}\frac{n-r}{n-1}\right)+\eta^{3}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{m}(m+1)\frac{\tau(\tau-1)}{2}L^{2}. (174)

For sufficiently small Î·ğœ‚\eta, such that

1âˆ’Lâ€‹Î·âˆ’Lâ€‹(1nâ€‹q+4â€‹nâˆ’rrâ€‹(nâˆ’1)â€‹(1+q))â€‹Ï„â€‹Î·âˆ’2â€‹L2â€‹Ï„â€‹(Ï„âˆ’1)â€‹Î·2â‰¥0,1ğ¿ğœ‚ğ¿1ğ‘›ğ‘4ğ‘›ğ‘Ÿğ‘Ÿğ‘›11ğ‘ğœğœ‚2superscriptğ¿2ğœğœ1superscriptğœ‚20\displaystyle 1-L\eta-L\left(\frac{1}{n}q+4\frac{n-r}{r(n-1)}(1+q)\right)\tau\eta-2L^{2}\tau(\tau-1)\eta^{2}\geq 0, (175)

we have

ğ”¼â€‹fâ€‹(ğ±k+1)ğ”¼ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘˜1\displaystyle\mathbb{E}f(\mathbf{x}_{k+1}) â‰¤ğ”¼â€‹fâ€‹(ğ±k)âˆ’12â€‹Î·â€‹âˆ‘t=0Ï„âˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±Â¯k,t)âˆ¥2absentğ”¼ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘˜12ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğœ1ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}f(\mathbf{x}_{k})-\frac{1}{2}\eta\sum_{t=0}^{\tau-1}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f(\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t})\right\rVert}^{2} (176)
+Î·2â€‹L2â€‹(1+q)â€‹Ï„â€‹(Ïƒ2n+4â€‹Ïƒ2râ€‹nâˆ’rnâˆ’1)+Î·3â€‹Ïƒ2nâ€‹(n+1)â€‹Ï„â€‹(Ï„âˆ’1)2â€‹L2.superscriptğœ‚2ğ¿21ğ‘ğœsuperscriptğœ2ğ‘›4superscriptğœ2ğ‘Ÿğ‘›ğ‘Ÿğ‘›1superscriptğœ‚3superscriptğœ2ğ‘›ğ‘›1ğœğœ12superscriptğ¿2\displaystyle\quad+\eta^{2}\frac{L}{2}(1+q)\tau\left(\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}+4\frac{\sigma^{2}}{r}\frac{n-r}{n-1}\right)+\eta^{3}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}(n+1)\frac{\tau(\tau-1)}{2}L^{2}. (177)

In Section 8.1 we show that if the stepsize is picked as Î·=1/Lâ€‹Tğœ‚1ğ¿ğ‘‡\eta=\nicefrac{{1}}{{L\sqrt{T}}} and the Tğ‘‡T ans Ï„ğœ\tau satisfy the condition (19) in Theorem 2, then (175) also holds. Now summing (177) over k=0,â‹¯,Kâˆ’1ğ‘˜0â‹¯ğ¾1k=0,\cdots,K-1 and rearranging the terms yield that

12â€‹Î·â€‹âˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1âˆ‘t=0Ï„âˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±Â¯k,t)âˆ¥212ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğœ1ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\frac{1}{2}\eta\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\sum_{t=0}^{\tau-1}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f(\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t})\right\rVert}^{2} (178)
â‰¤fâ€‹(ğ±0)âˆ’fâˆ—+Kâ€‹Î·2â€‹L2â€‹(1+q)â€‹Ï„â€‹(Ïƒ2n+4â€‹Ïƒ2râ€‹nâˆ’rnâˆ’1)+Kâ€‹Î·3â€‹Ïƒ2nâ€‹(n+1)â€‹Ï„â€‹(Ï„âˆ’1)2â€‹L2,absentğ‘“subscriptğ±0superscriptğ‘“ğ¾superscriptğœ‚2ğ¿21ğ‘ğœsuperscriptğœ2ğ‘›4superscriptğœ2ğ‘Ÿğ‘›ğ‘Ÿğ‘›1ğ¾superscriptğœ‚3superscriptğœ2ğ‘›ğ‘›1ğœğœ12superscriptğ¿2\displaystyle\quad\leq f(\mathbf{x}_{0})-f^{*}+K\eta^{2}\frac{L}{2}(1+q)\tau\left(\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}+4\frac{\sigma^{2}}{r}\frac{n-r}{n-1}\right)+K\eta^{3}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}(n+1)\frac{\tau(\tau-1)}{2}L^{2}, (179)

or

1Kâ€‹Ï„â€‹âˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1âˆ‘t=0Ï„âˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±Â¯k,t)âˆ¥21ğ¾ğœsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğœ1ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\frac{1}{K\tau}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\sum_{t=0}^{\tau-1}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f(\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t})\right\rVert}^{2} (180)
â‰¤2â€‹(fâ€‹(ğ±0)âˆ’fâˆ—)Î·â€‹Kâ€‹Ï„+Î·â€‹Lâ€‹(1+q)â€‹(Ïƒ2n+4â€‹Ïƒ2râ€‹nâˆ’rnâˆ’1)+Î·2â€‹Ïƒ2nâ€‹(n+1)â€‹(Ï„âˆ’1)â€‹L2.absent2ğ‘“subscriptğ±0superscriptğ‘“ğœ‚ğ¾ğœğœ‚ğ¿1ğ‘superscriptğœ2ğ‘›4superscriptğœ2ğ‘Ÿğ‘›ğ‘Ÿğ‘›1superscriptğœ‚2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›ğ‘›1ğœ1superscriptğ¿2\displaystyle\quad\leq\frac{2(f(\mathbf{x}_{0})-f^{*})}{\eta K\tau}+\eta L(1+q)\left(\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}+4\frac{\sigma^{2}}{r}\frac{n-r}{n-1}\right)+\eta^{2}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}(n+1)(\tau-1)L^{2}. (181)

Picking the stepsize Î·=1/Lâ€‹T=1/Lâ€‹Kâ€‹Ï„ğœ‚1ğ¿ğ‘‡1ğ¿ğ¾ğœ\eta=\nicefrac{{1}}{{L\sqrt{T}}}=\nicefrac{{1}}{{L\sqrt{K\tau}}} results in the following convergence rate:

1Tâ€‹âˆ‘k=0Kâˆ’1âˆ‘t=0Ï„âˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±Â¯k,t)âˆ¥21ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜0ğ¾1superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğœ1ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\frac{1}{T}\sum_{k=0}^{K-1}\sum_{t=0}^{\tau-1}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f(\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t})\right\rVert}^{2} (182)
â‰¤2â€‹Lâ€‹(fâ€‹(ğ±0)âˆ’fâˆ—)T+(1+q)â€‹(Ïƒ2n+Ïƒ2râ€‹nâˆ’rnâˆ’1)â€‹1T+Ïƒ2nâ€‹(n+1)â€‹Ï„âˆ’1T,absent2ğ¿ğ‘“subscriptğ±0superscriptğ‘“ğ‘‡1ğ‘superscriptğœ2ğ‘›superscriptğœ2ğ‘Ÿğ‘›ğ‘Ÿğ‘›11ğ‘‡superscriptğœ2ğ‘›ğ‘›1ğœ1ğ‘‡\displaystyle\leq\frac{2L(f(\mathbf{x}_{0})-f^{*})}{\sqrt{T}}+(1+q)\left(\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}+\frac{\sigma^{2}}{r}\frac{n-r}{n-1}\right)\frac{1}{\sqrt{T}}+\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}(n+1)\frac{\tau-1}{T}, (183)

which completes the proof of Theorem 2.

8.1 Discussion on stepsize Î·ğœ‚\eta

Here, we consider the constraint on the stepsize derived in (175) and show that if Î·ğœ‚\eta is picked according to Theorem 2, then it also satisfies (175). First, let the stepsize satisfy 1âˆ’Lâ€‹Î·â‰¥0.11ğ¿ğœ‚0.11-L\eta\geq 0.1. Now, if the following holds

Lâ€‹(1nâ€‹q+4â€‹nâˆ’rrâ€‹(nâˆ’1)â€‹(1+q))â€‹Ï„â€‹Î·+2â€‹L2â€‹(Ï„â€‹Î·)2â‰¤0.1,ğ¿1ğ‘›ğ‘4ğ‘›ğ‘Ÿğ‘Ÿğ‘›11ğ‘ğœğœ‚2superscriptğ¿2superscriptğœğœ‚20.1\displaystyle L\left(\frac{1}{n}q+4\frac{n-r}{r(n-1)}(1+q)\right)\tau\eta+2L^{2}(\tau\eta)^{2}\leq 0.1, (184)

the condition in (175) also holds. It is straightforward to see when (184) holds. To do so, consider the following quadratic inequality in terms of y=Î·â€‹Ï„ğ‘¦ğœ‚ğœy=\eta\tau:

2â€‹L2â€‹y2+Lâ€‹B2â€‹yâˆ’0.1â‰¤0,2superscriptğ¿2superscriptğ‘¦2ğ¿subscriptğµ2ğ‘¦0.10\displaystyle 2L^{2}y^{2}+LB_{2}y-0.1\leq 0, (185)

where

B2â‰”1nâ€‹q+4â€‹nâˆ’rrâ€‹(nâˆ’1)â€‹(1+q).â‰”subscriptğµ21ğ‘›ğ‘4ğ‘›ğ‘Ÿğ‘Ÿğ‘›11ğ‘\displaystyle B_{2}\coloneqq\frac{1}{n}q+4\frac{n-r}{r(n-1)}(1+q). (186)

We can solve the quadratic form in (185) for y=Î·â€‹Ï„ğ‘¦ğœ‚ğœy=\eta\tau which yields

Î·â€‹Ï„â‰¤B22+0.8âˆ’B24â€‹L.ğœ‚ğœsuperscriptsubscriptğµ220.8subscriptğµ24ğ¿\displaystyle\eta\tau\leq\frac{\sqrt{B_{2}^{2}+0.8}-B_{2}}{4L}. (187)

This implies that if the parameter Ï„ğœ\tau and the stepsize Î·ğœ‚\eta satisfy (187) and Î·â‰¤0.9/Lğœ‚0.9ğ¿\eta\leq\nicefrac{{0.9}}{{L}}, then the condition (175) is satisfied. In particular, for our pick of Î·=1/Lâ€‹Tğœ‚1ğ¿ğ‘‡\eta=\nicefrac{{1}}{{L\sqrt{T}}}, the condition Î·â‰¤0.9/Lğœ‚0.9ğ¿\eta\leq\nicefrac{{0.9}}{{L}} holds if Tâ‰¥2ğ‘‡2T\geq 2; and the constraint in (187) is equivalent to having

Ï„ğœ\displaystyle\tau â‰¤B22+0.8âˆ’B28â€‹T.absentsuperscriptsubscriptğµ220.8subscriptğµ28ğ‘‡\displaystyle\leq\frac{\sqrt{B_{2}^{2}+0.8}-B_{2}}{8}\sqrt{T}. (188)

8.2 Proof of Lemma 6

Recall that for any Lğ¿L-smooth function fğ‘“f and variables ğ±,ğ²ğ±ğ²\mathbf{x},{\mathbf{y}} we have

fâ€‹(ğ±)ğ‘“ğ±\displaystyle f(\mathbf{x}) â‰¤fâ€‹(ğ²)+âŸ¨âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ²),ğ±âˆ’ğ²âŸ©+L2â€‹âˆ¥ğ±âˆ’ğ²âˆ¥2.absentğ‘“ğ²âˆ‡ğ‘“ğ²ğ±ğ²ğ¿2superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ±ğ²2\displaystyle\leq f({\mathbf{y}})+\left\langle\nabla f({\mathbf{y}}),\mathbf{x}-{\mathbf{y}}\right\rangle+\frac{L}{2}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}-{\mathbf{y}}\right\rVert}^{2}. (189)

Therefore, we can write

fâ€‹(ğ±k+1)ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘˜1\displaystyle f(\mathbf{x}_{k+1}) =fâ€‹(ğ±^k+1+ğ±k+1âˆ’ğ±^k+1)absentğ‘“subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1subscriptğ±ğ‘˜1subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1\displaystyle=f(\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1}+\mathbf{x}_{k+1}-\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1}) (190)
â‰¤fâ€‹(ğ±^k+1)+âŸ¨âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±^k+1),ğ±k+1âˆ’ğ±^k+1âŸ©+L2â€‹âˆ¥ğ±k+1âˆ’ğ±^k+1âˆ¥2.absentğ‘“subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1âˆ‡ğ‘“subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1subscriptğ±ğ‘˜1subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1ğ¿2superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptğ±ğ‘˜1subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜12\displaystyle\leq f(\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1})+\left\langle\nabla f(\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1}),\mathbf{x}_{k+1}-\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1}\right\rangle+\frac{L}{2}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\mathbf{x}_{k+1}-\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1}\right\rVert}^{2}. (191)

We take expectation of both sides of (191) and since ğ±^k+1subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1} is unbiased for ğ±k+1subscriptğ±ğ‘˜1\mathbf{x}_{k+1}, that is ğ”¼ğ’®kâ€‹ğ±k+1=ğ±^k+1subscriptğ”¼subscriptğ’®ğ‘˜subscriptğ±ğ‘˜1subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1\mathbb{E}_{{\mathcal{S}}_{k}}\mathbf{x}_{k+1}=\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1} (See (48)), it yields that

ğ”¼â€‹fâ€‹(ğ±k+1)ğ”¼ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘˜1\displaystyle\mathbb{E}f(\mathbf{x}_{k+1}) â‰¤ğ”¼â€‹fâ€‹(ğ±^k+1)+L2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±^k+1âˆ’ğ±k+1âˆ¥2.absentğ”¼ğ‘“subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1ğ¿2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1subscriptğ±ğ‘˜12\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}f(\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1})+\frac{L}{2}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1}-\mathbf{x}_{k+1}\right\rVert}^{2}. (192)

Moreover, ğ±^k+1subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1} is also unbiased for ğ±Â¯k,Ï„subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğœ\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,\tau}, i.e. ğ”¼Qâ€‹ğ±^k+1=ğ±Â¯k,Ï„subscriptğ”¼ğ‘„subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğœ\mathbb{E}_{Q}\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1}=\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,\tau} (See (51)), and since fğ‘“f is Lğ¿L-smooth, we can write

ğ”¼â€‹fâ€‹(ğ±^k+1)ğ”¼ğ‘“subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1\displaystyle\mathbb{E}f(\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1}) â‰¤ğ”¼â€‹fâ€‹(ğ±Â¯k,Ï„)+L2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±^k+1âˆ’ğ±Â¯k,Ï„âˆ¥2,absentğ”¼ğ‘“subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğœğ¿2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscript^ğ±ğ‘˜1subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğœ2\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}f(\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,\tau})+\frac{L}{2}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\widehat{\mathbf{x}}_{k+1}-\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,\tau}\right\rVert}^{2}, (193)

which together with (192) concludes the lemma.

8.3 Proof of Lemma 7

According to the update rule in Algorithm 1, for every t=0,â‹¯,Ï„âˆ’1ğ‘¡0â‹¯ğœ1t=0,\cdots,\tau-1 the average model is

ğ±Â¯k,t+1=ğ±Â¯k,tâˆ’Î·â€‹1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i)).subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡1subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡ğœ‚1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡\displaystyle\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t+1}=\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t}-\eta\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right). (194)

Since fğ‘“f is Lğ¿L-smooth, we can write

fâ€‹(ğ±Â¯k,t+1)ğ‘“subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡1\displaystyle f(\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t+1}) â‰¤fâ€‹(ğ±Â¯k,t)âˆ’Î·â€‹âŸ¨âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±Â¯k,t),1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âŸ©+Î·2â€‹L2â€‹âˆ¥1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ¥2.absentğ‘“subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡ğœ‚âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡superscriptğœ‚2ğ¿2superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\leq f(\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t})-\eta\left\langle\nabla f(\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t}),\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)\right\rangle+\eta^{2}\frac{L}{2}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}. (195)

The inner product term above can be written in expectation as follows:

2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âŸ¨âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±Â¯k,t),1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âŸ©2ğ”¼âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡\displaystyle 2\mathbb{E}\left\langle\nabla f(\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t}),\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)\right\rangle =1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âŸ¨âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±Â¯k,t),âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âŸ©absent1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›2ğ”¼âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡\displaystyle=\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}2\mathbb{E}\left\langle\nabla f(\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t}),\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)\right\rangle (196)
=ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±Â¯k,t)âˆ¥2+1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ¥2absentğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡21ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f(\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t})\right\rVert}^{2}+\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (197)
âˆ’1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±Â¯k,t)âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ¥2,1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\quad-\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f(\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t})-\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}, (198)

where we used the identity 2â€‹âŸ¨ğš,ğ›âŸ©=âˆ¥ğšâˆ¥2+âˆ¥ğ›âˆ¥2âˆ’âˆ¥ğšâˆ’ğ›âˆ¥22ğšğ›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğš2superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğ›2superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥ğšğ›22\langle{\mathbf{a}},{\mathbf{b}}\rangle=\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{a}}\right\rVert}^{2}+\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{b}}\right\rVert}^{2}-\mathinner{\!\left\lVert{\mathbf{a}}-{\mathbf{b}}\right\rVert}^{2} for any two vectors ğš,ğ›ğšğ›{\mathbf{a}},{\mathbf{b}}. In the following, we bound each of the three terms in the RHS of (198). Starting with the third term, we use the smoothness assumption to write

âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±Â¯k,t)âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ¥2â‰¤L2â€‹âˆ¥ğ±Â¯k,tâˆ’ğ±k,t(i)âˆ¥2.superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2superscriptğ¿2superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f(\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t})-\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}\leq L^{2}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t}-{\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right\rVert}^{2}. (199)

Moreover, local models ğ±k,t(i)subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡{\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t} and average model ğ±Â¯k,tsubscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t} are respectively

ğ±k,t(i)=ğ±kâˆ’Î·â€‹(âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k)+âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,1(i))+â‹¯+âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,tâˆ’1(i))),subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡subscriptğ±ğ‘˜ğœ‚~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptğ±ğ‘˜~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜1â‹¯~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡1\displaystyle{\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}=\mathbf{x}_{k}-\eta\left(\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{k})+\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,1}\right)+\cdots+\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t-1}\right)\right), (200)

and

ğ±Â¯k,t=ğ±kâ€‹Ï„âˆ’Î·â€‹(1nâ€‹âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡~â€‹fjâ€‹(ğ±k)+1nâ€‹âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡~â€‹fjâ€‹(ğ±k,1(j))+â‹¯+1nâ€‹âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡~â€‹fjâ€‹(ğ±k,tâˆ’1(j))).subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡subscriptğ±ğ‘˜ğœğœ‚1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘—subscriptğ±ğ‘˜1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘—subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘—ğ‘˜1â‹¯1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘—subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘—ğ‘˜ğ‘¡1\displaystyle\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t}=\mathbf{x}_{k\tau}-\eta\left(\frac{1}{n}\sum_{j\in[n]}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{j}(\mathbf{x}_{k})+\frac{1}{n}\sum_{j\in[n]}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{j}\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(j)}_{k,1}\right)+\cdots+\frac{1}{n}\sum_{j\in[n]}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{j}\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(j)}_{k,t-1}\right)\right). (201)

Therefore, the expected deviation of each local model form the average model can be written as

ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±Â¯k,tâˆ’ğ±k,t(i)âˆ¥2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t}-{\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right\rVert}^{2} (202)
â‰¤2â€‹Î·2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥1nâ€‹âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡~â€‹fjâ€‹(ğ±k)+1nâ€‹âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡~â€‹fjâ€‹(ğ±k,1(j))+â‹¯+1nâ€‹âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡~â€‹fjâ€‹(ğ±k,tâˆ’1(j))âˆ¥2absent2superscriptğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘—subscriptğ±ğ‘˜1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘—subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘—ğ‘˜1â‹¯1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘—subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘—ğ‘˜ğ‘¡12\displaystyle\leq 2\eta^{2}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\frac{1}{n}\sum_{j\in[n]}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{j}(\mathbf{x}_{k})+\frac{1}{n}\sum_{j\in[n]}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{j}\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(j)}_{k,1}\right)+\cdots+\frac{1}{n}\sum_{j\in[n]}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{j}\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(j)}_{k,t-1}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (203)
+2â€‹Î·2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k)+âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,1(i))+â‹¯+âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,tâˆ’1(i))âˆ¥22superscriptğœ‚2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptğ±ğ‘˜~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜1â‹¯~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡12\displaystyle\quad+2\eta^{2}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}(\mathbf{x}_{k})+\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,1}\right)+\cdots+\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t-1}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (204)
â‰¤2â€‹Î·2â€‹(tâ€‹Ïƒ2n+âˆ¥1nâ€‹âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k)+1nâ€‹âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,1(j))+â‹¯+1nâ€‹âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,tâˆ’1(j))âˆ¥2)absent2superscriptğœ‚2ğ‘¡superscriptğœ2ğ‘›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘˜1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘—ğ‘˜1â‹¯1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘—ğ‘˜ğ‘¡12\displaystyle\leq 2\eta^{2}\left(t\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}+\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\frac{1}{n}\sum_{j\in[n]}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{k})+\frac{1}{n}\sum_{j\in[n]}\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(j)}_{k,1}\right)+\cdots+\frac{1}{n}\sum_{j\in[n]}\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(j)}_{k,t-1}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}\right) (205)
+2â€‹Î·2â€‹(tâ€‹Ïƒ2+âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k)+âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,1(i))+â‹¯+âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,tâˆ’1(i))âˆ¥2)2superscriptğœ‚2ğ‘¡superscriptğœ2superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘˜âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜1â‹¯âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡12\displaystyle\quad+2\eta^{2}\left(t\sigma^{2}+\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{k})+\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,1}\right)+\cdots+\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t-1}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}\right) (206)
â‰¤2â€‹Î·2â€‹tâ€‹Ïƒ2n+2â€‹Î·2â€‹tâ€‹(1nâ€‹âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k)âˆ¥2+1nâ€‹âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,1(j))âˆ¥2+â‹¯+1nâ€‹âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,tâˆ’1(j))âˆ¥2)absent2superscriptğœ‚2ğ‘¡superscriptğœ2ğ‘›2superscriptğœ‚2ğ‘¡1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘˜21ğ‘›subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘—ğ‘˜12â‹¯1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘—ğ‘˜ğ‘¡12\displaystyle\leq 2\eta^{2}t\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}+2\eta^{2}t\left(\frac{1}{n}\sum_{j\in[n]}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{k})\right\rVert}^{2}+\frac{1}{n}\sum_{j\in[n]}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(j)}_{k,1}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}+\cdots+\frac{1}{n}\sum_{j\in[n]}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(j)}_{k,t-1}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}\right) (207)
+2â€‹Î·2â€‹tâ€‹Ïƒ2+2â€‹Î·2â€‹tâ€‹(âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k)âˆ¥2+âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,1(i))âˆ¥2+â‹¯+âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,tâˆ’1(i))âˆ¥2).2superscriptğœ‚2ğ‘¡superscriptğœ22superscriptğœ‚2ğ‘¡superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘˜2superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜12â‹¯superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡12\displaystyle\quad+2\eta^{2}t\sigma^{2}+2\eta^{2}t\left(\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{k})\right\rVert}^{2}+\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,1}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}+\cdots+\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t-1}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}\right). (208)

Summing (208) over all the workers iâˆˆ[n]ğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›i\in[n] yields

âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±Â¯k,tâˆ’ğ±k,t(i)âˆ¥2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t}-{\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right\rVert}^{2} (209)
â‰¤2â€‹Î·2â€‹tâ€‹Ïƒ2+2â€‹Î·2â€‹tâ€‹(âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k)âˆ¥2+âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,1(j))âˆ¥2+â‹¯+âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,tâˆ’1(j))âˆ¥2)absent2superscriptğœ‚2ğ‘¡superscriptğœ22superscriptğœ‚2ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘˜2subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘—ğ‘˜12â‹¯subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘—ğ‘˜ğ‘¡12\displaystyle\leq 2\eta^{2}t\sigma^{2}+2\eta^{2}t\left(\sum_{j\in[n]}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{k})\right\rVert}^{2}+\sum_{j\in[n]}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(j)}_{k,1}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}+\cdots+\sum_{j\in[n]}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(j)}_{k,t-1}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}\right) (210)
+2â€‹Î·2â€‹tâ€‹Ïƒ2â€‹n+2â€‹Î·2â€‹tâ€‹(âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k)âˆ¥2+âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,1(i))âˆ¥2+â‹¯+âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,tâˆ’1(i))âˆ¥2)2superscriptğœ‚2ğ‘¡superscriptğœ2ğ‘›2superscriptğœ‚2ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘˜2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜12â‹¯subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡12\displaystyle\quad+2\eta^{2}t\sigma^{2}n+2\eta^{2}t\left(\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{k})\right\rVert}^{2}+\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,1}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}+\cdots+\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t-1}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}\right) (211)
=2â€‹Î·2â€‹tâ€‹Ïƒ2â€‹(n+1)+4â€‹Î·2â€‹tâ€‹(âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k)âˆ¥2+âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,1(j))âˆ¥2+â‹¯+âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,tâˆ’1(j))âˆ¥2).absent2superscriptğœ‚2ğ‘¡superscriptğœ2ğ‘›14superscriptğœ‚2ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘˜2subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘—ğ‘˜12â‹¯subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘—ğ‘˜ğ‘¡12\displaystyle=2\eta^{2}t\sigma^{2}(n+1)+4\eta^{2}t\left(\sum_{j\in[n]}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{k})\right\rVert}^{2}+\sum_{j\in[n]}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(j)}_{k,1}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}+\cdots+\sum_{j\in[n]}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(j)}_{k,t-1}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}\right). (212)

Finally, summing (212) over t=0,â‹¯,Ï„âˆ’1ğ‘¡0â‹¯ğœ1t=0,\cdots,\tau-1 results in the following:

âˆ‘t=0Ï„âˆ’1âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥ğ±Â¯k,tâˆ’ğ±k,t(i)âˆ¥2superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğœ1subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥subscriptÂ¯ğ±ğ‘˜ğ‘¡subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\sum_{t=0}^{\tau-1}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\overline{\mathbf{x}}_{k,t}-{\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right\rVert}^{2} (213)
â‰¤2â€‹Î·2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹(n+1)â€‹âˆ‘t=0Ï„âˆ’1t+4â€‹Î·2â€‹âˆ‘t=0Ï„âˆ’1tâ€‹(âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k)âˆ¥2+âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,1(j))âˆ¥2+â‹¯+âˆ‘jâˆˆ[n]âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,tâˆ’1(j))âˆ¥2)absent2superscriptğœ‚2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›1superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğœ1ğ‘¡4superscriptğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğœ1ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±ğ‘˜2subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘—ğ‘˜12â‹¯subscriptğ‘—delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘—ğ‘˜ğ‘¡12\displaystyle\leq 2\eta^{2}\sigma^{2}(n+1)\sum_{t=0}^{\tau-1}t+4\eta^{2}\sum_{t=0}^{\tau-1}t\left(\sum_{j\in[n]}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{k})\right\rVert}^{2}+\sum_{j\in[n]}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(j)}_{k,1}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}+\cdots+\sum_{j\in[n]}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(j)}_{k,t-1}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}\right) (214)
â‰¤Î·2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹(n+1)â€‹Ï„â€‹(Ï„âˆ’1)+2â€‹Î·2â€‹Ï„â€‹(Ï„âˆ’1)â€‹âˆ‘t=0Ï„âˆ’2âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ¥2.absentsuperscriptğœ‚2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›1ğœğœ12superscriptğœ‚2ğœğœ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğœ2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\leq\eta^{2}\sigma^{2}(n+1)\tau(\tau-1)+2\eta^{2}\tau(\tau-1)\sum_{t=0}^{\tau-2}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}. (215)

Next, we bound the third term in (195). Using Assumption 3 we have

ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ¥2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} =ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ¥2+ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ¥2absentğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}+\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)-\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} (216)
â‰¤1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ¥2+Ïƒ2n.absent1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}+\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}. (217)

Summing (217) over iterations t=0,â‹¯,Ï„âˆ’1ğ‘¡0â‹¯ğœ1t=0,\cdots,\tau-1 yields

âˆ‘t=0Ï„âˆ’1Î·2â€‹L2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥1nâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]âˆ‡~â€‹fiâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ¥2superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğœ1superscriptğœ‚2ğ¿2ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥1ğ‘›subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›~âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\sum_{t=0}^{\tau-1}\eta^{2}\frac{L}{2}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i\in[n]}\widetilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)\right\rVert}^{2} â‰¤Î·2â€‹L2â€‹1nâ€‹âˆ‘t=0Ï„âˆ’1âˆ‘iâˆˆ[n]ğ”¼â€‹âˆ¥âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±k,t(i))âˆ¥2+Î·2â€‹L2â€‹Ïƒ2nâ€‹Ï„.absentsuperscriptğœ‚2ğ¿21ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğœ1subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-âˆ¥âˆ¥âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptsuperscriptğ±ğ‘–ğ‘˜ğ‘¡2superscriptğœ‚2ğ¿2superscriptğœ2ğ‘›ğœ\displaystyle\leq\eta^{2}\frac{L}{2}\frac{1}{n}\sum_{t=0}^{\tau-1}\sum_{i\in[n]}\mathbb{E}\mathinner{\!\left\lVert\nabla f\left({\mathbf{x}}^{(i)}_{k,t}\right)\right\rVert}^{2}+\eta^{2}\frac{L}{2}\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n}\tau. (218)

Now we can sum (195) for t=0,â‹¯,Ï„âˆ’1ğ‘¡0â‹¯ğœ1t=0,\cdots,\tau-1 and use the results in (215) and (218) to conclude:
